ReferenceDocuments.name: PCREASND
ReferenceDocuments.description: Maps directly to the SDTMIG variable.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The reason the data are not available may be chosen from a sponsor defined list (or example, broken equipment, subject refused, etc.) or entered as free text. When PCREASND is used, the SDTMIG variable PCSTAT should also be populated in the SDTM-based dataset.
